welcome.title: Are you sure you want to take this quiz?
welcome.description: Some people may go cook waffles after this quiz

first.text: You wake up at 6:00 AM. What is the first thing you will do?

second.text: With that in mind, you decided to close your eyes for:

third.text: Suddenly, you hear a sound from your kitchen and open your eyes. What will you take with you?

fourth.text: You open a door and see a waffle with a spoon. What do you do?

buttons.first: Stay calm and ask him if he wants to be eaten
buttons.second: Point your weapon at him and start screaming
buttons.third: Am I dreaming? This can't be possible

fifth.text: A waffle asks you politely to help him. Shall we?

buttons.first: Yes! We can even become friends later!!
buttons.second: Yes, in the end I will eat him!
buttons.third: I'm curious to see what will happen next...

sixth.text: A waffle shows you the ingredients for cooking, but you don't know how to cook. What do you do?

buttons.second: I think I can figure it out, and if not, I will eat him
buttons.third: Uhhm... not sure, but I will try my best!

seventh.text: Almost done! All you need to do is add one of the ingredients. Which one should it be?

eight.text: Done! You show him your perfect homemade waffle, and he seems happy!

buttons.first: Ask him if he wants to be your friend?
buttons.second: Leave him and move on with your life
buttons.third: Eat him and your homemade waffle!

ninth.text: Suddenly, your vision goes dark and you fall to the floor. You open your eyes and see the old, familiar ceiling.

buttons.second: Was it a dream? Now I want to go cook some waffles!
buttons.third: Finally, this scary dream is over

pandan.name: Pandan Waffle
pandan.description: Tropical green crispness with coconut glaze.

savory.name: Savory Galette
savory.description: Buckwheat waffle stuffed with herbs and cheese.

velvet.name: Red Velvet Waffle
velvet.description: Decadent cocoa with a cream cheese crown.

chocolate.name: Chocolate-Stuffed Belgian
chocolate.description: Melted chocolate core in every bite.
